description: Charlotte "Charlie" Morningstar is the Hellborn princess of Hell and the founder of the Happy Hotel, a rehabilitation center for sinners.  Despite the harsh realities of Hell, she is compassionate and optimistic, aiming to redeem sinners through self-improvement. Her naive idealism is often tempered by her girlfriend, Vaggie. Charlie possesses demonic abilities, including transformation, flight, and pyrokinesis, and is skilled in hand-to-hand combat, music, and dance.
